item.title: Make sense of your watchdog entries
item.description: Websites have errors, which are ideally logged. Logging though is one thing, you also need to make some sense out of them. In an ideal world you would have some logging server like graylog or similar. Sadly this is not avaiable on every site. Here is an example of just looking at error messages stored in the database, but the general toolsuite could be applied to everything. Get the data We use drush to fetch the error messages from drupal:
